Original title: Kill Your Darlings
Year: 2013
Duration: 104 min.
Country: United States
Director: John Krokidas
Screenplay: John Krokidas, Austin Bunn
Music: Nico Muhly
Photo: Reed Morano
Starring: Daniel Radcliffe, Dane DeHaan, Michael C. Hall, Ben Foster, David Cross, Elizabeth Olsen, John Cullum, Jennifer Jason Leigh, Kyra Sedgwick, Jack Huston, David Rasche
Studio: Killer Films / Benaroya Pictures / Dontanville / Frattaroli Management ( D / F)
Genre: Thriller. Drama. Romance | Biography 40s . . Literature . Indie USA . Based on a true story
Official Website: http://www.sonyclassics.com/killyourdarlings/

Synopsis:
---------
New York, 40. Allen Ginsberg just joined Columbia University. He meets Lucien Carr, who delve into the underworld of revolutionary poetry and literature, forming together with Jack Kerouac and William Burroughs and others. His passion to change the rules and charged inner feelings so strongly that they will be involved in a murder plot.

Awards:
-------
2013: Sundance Film Festival: Official Selection films in competition
2013: Toronto Film Festival (TIFF): Nominated Audience Award (Best Film)
2013: Gotham Awards: Best New Actor (Dane DeHaan)
